% About
# <i class="fas fa-glasses"></i>About {-}
In this website are available the codes used as motivation examples for the manuscript *Statistical Models and Approaches to Deciphering the Genotype-by-Environment Interaction (GEI) Effect: An Applicable Review for Use in Plant Breeding Programs*


# <i class="fas fa-code"></i>How to reproduce? {-}

* Download data
* Open the `code.Rmd` file in RStudio.
* Optionally change functions and arguments.
* Knit the document to see the results.
